# The `CallBrInst` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

CallBr instruction, tracking function calls that may not return control but instead transfer it to a third location. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class llvm::CallBrInst</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

CallBr instruction, tracking function calls that may not return control but instead transfer it to a third location.

The SubclassData field is used to hold the calling convention of the call.

Definition at line 3830 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>.

### Create() {#ac56dc4e7c9b62727513a77d85a3dc243}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CallBrInst &#42; CallBrInst::Create (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callbrinst">CallBrInst</a> &#42; CBI, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa97c65466bdd34abda6772dd32eb5d19">OperandBundleDef</a> &gt; Bundles, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/insertposition">InsertPosition</a> InsertBefore=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Create a clone of <code>CBI</code> with a different set of operand bundles and insert it before <code>InsertBefore</code>.

The returned callbr instruction is identical to <code>CBI</code> in every way except that the operand bundles for the new instruction are set to the operand bundles in <code>Bundles</code>.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h/#l03915">3915</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/ir/instructions-h">Instructions.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp/#l00906">906</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/instructions-cpp">Instructions.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
